entry.title: BIP proposal: NODE_NETWORK_LIMITED service bits
entry.summary: The author of the message has shared a BIP proposal to improve the signaling of pruned peers, who currently have no way to signal their valuable service. The proposal can be found on GitHub under the name "NODE_NETWORK_LIMITED-BIP-DRAFT". The author also welcomes feedback on this draft. Additionally, there are two attachments to the message: an HTML attachment and a signature.asc file.
